title: Pinoy Pilgrim: In Search of Filipino Identity
description: In this long-awaited book, the author of Pinoy Pilgrim, Manoling de Leon,, one of the creative pioneers in Philippine advertising and marketing, reveals his success secrets and presents an optimistic and inspiring vision of the Filipino identity. His multiple careers - Guam OFW, construction manager, advertising and marketing executive, and consultant to tycoons and Presidents - span important periods in Philippine history. Pinoy Pilgrim will surely warm your heart, captivate our imagination, and make you fall in love with the Philippines and its people.
author: Manoling de Leon
